channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: LG says its CLOiD home robot will be folding laundry and making breakfast at CES
item.description: LG teased that it would be showing off a new robot for a "zero labor home" at CES. We now have a bit more detail on what to expect. The company says that its CLOiD home robot can fetch milk from the fridge, put a croissant in the oven, and even do some laundry, including […]

item.title: How to watch the Lenovo Tech World event at CES 2026
item.description: We've known for several months now that tech giant Lenovo is hosting its Tech World event at Sphere is Las Vegas during CES week. And like many other tech conglomerates, the world's largest PC manufacturer by units shipped is centering its focus on AI. Lenovo says it will be a "Tech World experience unlike anything CES has seen before." We'll tell you where to livestream the event and what the company has teased so far. How to watch the Lenovo CES 2026 event live Lenovo CEO Yuanqing Yang will host the event on Tuesday, January 6 at 8PM ET. You can follow along to the livestream on YouTube once...

item.title: I tested Hori’s cheap Nintendo Switch 2 camera — this one flaw makes it hard to recommend
item.description: Hori’s Piranha Plant camera didn’t impress me, so I tested its minimalist alternative instead — is it any good?

item.title: How to watch 2026 Critics’ Choice Awards online — live stream the film and TV awards ceremony from anywhere
item.description: Prepare for a star-studded evening as the CCAs honor the best in film and TV from last year. Here's how to watch 2026 Critics’ Choice Awards online anywhere.

item.title: Ce moniteur LG 4K de 32″, avec un bras articulé et qui fait office de Smart TV coûte près de 200 € de moins
item.description: Du haut de sa dalle de 32 pouces, ce moniteur LG peut s'utiliser dans tous les sens et pourra répondre à tous vos besoins. Sur le site de la marque, il tombe à 823,99 euros et connaît une remise de 176 euros.

item.title: How to watch the LG CES 2026 press conference
item.description: LG For years, LG has opened CES press day with the first event of the morning. Though arch-rival Samsung getting the jump on its fellow Korean rival by giving its presentation the evening before, LG will be hitting the podium at breakfast time with the theme "Innovation in Tune with You." As with many tech-focused events nowadays, AI is expected to serve as the unifying thread of LG's CES 2026 presentation. That said, LG — much like Apple — has its own take on the acronym, referring to it as "Affectionate Intelligence." The company will share "its vision for elevating daily life through Affec...

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs téléviseurs 65 pouces 4K (Oled, QLED ou Full LED) en 2026 ?
item.description: Vous cherchez la meilleure TV 65 pouces ? Voyez les choses en grand avec notre sélection de téléviseurs grand format. Vous trouverez ici les meilleures TV de 65 pouces, qu'elles soient Oled, QLED ou LCD, des marques Samsung, LG, Philips ou encore Sony.

item.title: The ‘Stranger Things’ Brothers Keep Explaining Why Things Ended Like That
item.description: The Duffers want 'Stranger Things' fans to draw their own conclusions, but did they lay the proper foundation to help with that?

item.title: La batterie électrique au sel et au charbon, le plan d’EDF pour baisser le prix de l’electricité et la moins chère des voitures électriques chinoises – Le récap’ Survoltés
item.description: Cette semaine, l'actualité électrique était chargée, entre l’avancée de l’Europe en matière de batteries, la domination retrouvée de Renault sur l’électrique, sans oublier les polémiques autour de Tesla et Xpeng.

item.title: GE unveils smart fridge with barcode scanner linked to Instacart for delivery
item.description: GE's new Smart Refrigerator with Kitchen Assistant has a barcode scanner and a camera to check perishables.
